K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:6b-4: kye ma 'khor ba 'di ni ring ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:6b-5: kye ma sems can gyi khams 'di ni mtha' yas so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:6b-6: des 'di ltar tshul bzhin du yid la bya ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:6b-7: kye ma 'khor ba 'di ni nam mkha' ltar mu med pa'o; ;kye ma sems can gyi khams 'di ni nam mkha' ltar mu med pa ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:6b-9: mya ngan las 'das pa'ang med de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:6b-10: gzhan du na chos kyi brdar sems can nam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:6b-12: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes tha snyad du btags par zad do zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:6b-14: de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:6b-18: de nas 'khor der gangg'a'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i bud med gcig 'dus te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:6b-19: 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:6b-20: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7a-3: bdag gis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las ji skad du bstan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bu yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o zhes nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7a-5: bud med des gser gyi me tog dang; dngul gyi me tog dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7a-6: chu las skyes pa'i me tog dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7a-7: thang las skyes pa'i me tog dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7a-9: gser gyi kha dog gi na bza' phrugs su sbyar te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7a-10: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su gtor to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7a-13: na bza' phrugs su sbyar ba de dag gtor ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad steng gi nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi dang ldan pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7a-18: mdangs dga' ba yid du 'ong bar gnas par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7a-19: de nas bud med des khang pa brtsegs pa de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7a-24: gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7b-0: bcom @7b ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa du ma 'di lta ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7b-7: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu thon par gyur nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7b-8: de dag mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dong ste phyir 'ongs nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7b-9: bcom ldan 'das la g-yas phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7b-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7b-12: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:7b-13: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:12b-14: sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:12b-15: bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas thams cad rtog par rig pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:12b-16: 'gro ba mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa ni bya ba gang dang gang rtsom yang thams cad du rnyed pa chen po dang ldan te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:12b-17: rnyed pa des skye bo mang po la rim gror byed; bkur stir byed /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:12b-20: de shin tu dga' zhing spro ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:12b-21: nyams dga' zhing yid bde nas dgos pa zhig gi phyir pha ma dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:12b-22: bu dang chung ma dag khrid de 'brog dgon pa byis pa rnams 'jigs shing skyi g-ya' bar song ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:12b-23: skyes bu des der phyin nas pha ma dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:12b-25: chung ma la mi 'jigs pa byin te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:12b-28: bdag gis khyed 'brog dgon pa 'jigs shing nyams mi bde ba 'di las myur du gdon cing myur du thar bar bya'o zhes mi 'jigs pa byin te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-1: bu de la gsod pa'i dgra phyir rgol pa mang po nye bar gnas par gyur nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-2: skyes bu de'ang shes rab kyi mthu dam pa dang ldan par gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-5: chung ma dag 'brog dgon pa de nas bton te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-6: bde zhing nyon ma mongs par thar par byas nas phyir grong ngam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-9: ljongs kyi 'dab tu ma snad ma nyams par phyin nas dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes te dgra phyir rgol ba'i sems can de dag la'ang sems kyis sdang bar mi byed de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-11: skyes bu des sgyu rtsal thams cad la byang bar byas pas; des 'brog dgon pa der phyir rgol ba de dag pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-12: phyir rgol pa gzhan ches phal che ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-15: ches mtshon cha sra ba dang ldan pa dag sprul te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-16: phyir rgol ba de dag thams cad 'jigs pa des med par gyur nas skyes bu des pha ma dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-18: chung ma de dag nyon ma mongs par thar bar byas nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-19: bde bar rnam par spyod pa zhig yod na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-20: rab 'byor; de bzhin du gang gi tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la byams par dmigs pa'i sems dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-24: btang snyoms su dmigs pa'i sems kyis khyab par byas nas gnas te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13a-25: de'i skabs su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa bzhi la gnas shing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-0: pha rol tu phyin pa drug @13b yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-1: yongs su rdzogs par byas nas zag pa zad pa ma thob bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-2: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang; mtshan ma med pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-3: smon pa med pa la gnas shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-4: de'i skabs su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan mas kyang rnam par mi spyod /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-5: mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang mngon du byas pas nyan thos kyi sa'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'ang mngon du mi byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-10: 'dab chags bya ni bar snang la rgyu zhing sa la mi ltung ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-11: nam mkha' bar snang la gnas kyang de la gnas pa med do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-13: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dris par byed cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-14: stong pa nyid la'ang rnam par spyod /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-16: smon pa med pa la yongs su 'dris par byed cing mtshan ma med pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-17: smon pa med pa la'ang rnam par spyod de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-20: smon pa med pa gang mngon du byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:13b-22: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-0: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs par nyan thos @14a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ba'ang mngon du mi byed de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-3: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa la spyad nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-4: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-8: skyes bu mthu dang ldan pa 'phong rtsal gyi slob dpon du gyur pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-9: 'phong rtsal bslab pa la shin tu byang ba zhig yod la /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-10: des mda' zhig gnam du 'phangs te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-12: mda' gzhan gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de 'phangs pas mda' snga ma de sa la ltung du ma bcug ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-13: de ji srid du skyes bu des da ni mda' 'di sa la ltung bar bya'o snyam du 'dod par ma byas pas de srid du mda' de sa la mi ltung ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-14: nam mda' phyi ma ma 'phangs pa de'i tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-15: mda' gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag sa la ldog go /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-17: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-18: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'ang ji srid du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de srid du yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa mngon du mi byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14a-19: nam dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par gyur pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dam pa mngon du byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14b-0: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems @14b dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14b-1: chos de dag gi chos nyid de ltar yongs su brtag par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos nyid 'di la slob pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14b-5: yang dag pa'i mtha' la slob pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14b-6: de bzhin nyid la slob pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14b-7: chos kyi dbyings la slob pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14b-8: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14b-9: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la slob cing bar ma dor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur ba ni dka' ba bgyid pa ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14b-16: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba'i phyir te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14b-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba de dag gi smon lam gyi khyad par ni rnam pa de lta bur 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:14b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad ni bdag gis yongs su ma btang ste dam pa ma yin pa'i chos la gnas pa 'di dag ni bdag gis yongs su dgrol bar bya'o zhes de lta bu'i sems mngon par bsgrub cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-0: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par rnam @15a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-1: par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-2: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-3: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa de'i tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-4: ji srid du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob kyi bar du bar ma dor yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed par rig par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-6: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe 'di lta ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-9: phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-10: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-11: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-12: yang dag par spong ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-16: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-17: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-18: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-19: gnas zab mo de dag la brtag par 'dod par gyur na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-20: des 'di ltar 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-21: sems can du 'du shes pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-24: gso bar 'du shes pa dang; skyes bur 'du shes pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-25: gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-26: shed can du 'du shes pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-27: shed bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15a-28: byed pa por 'du shes pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-0: tshor ba @15b por 'du shes pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-1: 'jug pa por 'du shes pas dmigs pa la spyod kyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-2: de dag gi dmigs pa spang ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-4: snyam du sems mngon par bsgrub par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-5: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-7: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' gang mngon du byas pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-8: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-10: dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-11: rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba mngon du mi byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-13: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa de dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-15: thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ni bar ma dor yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon du mi byed de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-16: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-17: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-18: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-19: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-20: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:15b-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-0: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang yongs su 'grib @16a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-2: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-3: yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-4: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-7: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-8: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-12: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'ang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-13: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-14: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-17: smon pa med pa yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-18: mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-23: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-26: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-27: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-29: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-30: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang ldan pa yin te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16a-31: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-0: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'i @16b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel zhing de'i dbang po rnams kyang ches rno bar 'gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-2: rang sangs rgyas kyi lta bu ma yin par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-4: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-5: sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas phyin ci log bzhi la spyod spyod pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-9: sdug par 'du shes pa la spyod spyod pa yin gyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-10: de dag gi phyir byang chub tu spyad par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-12: ci nas kyang rtag ces bya ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-15: sdug ces bya ba'i yongs su rgyu ba med par chos bstan par bya'o snyam ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-16: sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan la thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzogs /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-19: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-22: snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:16b-23: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-0: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug @17a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-1: kyang; bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-3: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni yun ring po nas dmigs pa la spyod spyod pa ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-16: mthong pa po zhes bya ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-21: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-24: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-25: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams zhes bya ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-26: stong pa nyid rnams zhes bya ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-27: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-31: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-33: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-34: stong pa nyid dang; mtshan ma med pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-35: smon pa med pa zhes bya ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-38: gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17b-1: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17b-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya bar dmigs pa la spyod spyod pa yin gyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17b-5: de la bdag gis ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17b-6: sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa'i nyes pa de dag med par bya'o snyam ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17b-7: de sems bskyed pa de lta bu dag dang ldan la thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17b-9: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17b-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:17b-12: snying rje chen po yongs su ma rdzogs par yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed de /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:19a-12: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la spyod pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:19a-14: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:19a-20: gzungs kyi sgo la spyod pa dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:19a-30: de ni gnas ma yin no //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:19b-0: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 'di dag la yongs su 'dris par byed @19b pa de dag la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos 'di dag la spyad de yongs su 'dris par byas nas /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:19b-17: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:22a-10: mgo bcad par gyur pa mthong ngam /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:22a-25: rmi lam de rmis pa'i 'og tu sad nas kyang 'di snyam ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:22a-26: kye ma khams gsum pa 'di dag kun kyang rmi lam lta bu ste /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:22b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ngan song gsum po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ba de ltar spyod do //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:22b-11: rmi lam gyi mtha' gang yin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do snyam na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:22b-13: 'di'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:22b-15: gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rmi lam mam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:22b-16: sad pa'i tshe grong khyer tshig par gyur na 'di snyam du bdag gis rmi lam mam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:23a-0: sad pa'i tshe rnam pa gang @23a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:23a-2: mtshan ma gang dag mthong ba'i rnam pa dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:23a-23: srang la la ni ma tshig na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:23a-25: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:23a-26: sems can 'di dag gi khyim la la ni tshig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:23a-27: khyim la la ni ma tshig pa las na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:23a-28: sems can 'di dag gis chos spong ba'i las byas pas de dag gi las tshe 'di la rnam par smin te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:23a-29: de dag chos la skur ba de nyid kyis las kyi lhag ma'ang rnam par smin par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rig par bya ste /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:23b-8: mtshan ma de dag bstan par bya'o //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:23b-12: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du gal te /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:23b-14: bdag gis bsam pa yongs su dag cing /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:23b-19: bdag la rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med la /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes bya bar bdag gi bsam pa thugs su chud ce na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24a-13: bden pa'i tshig des skyes pa'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24a-14: bud med 'di mi ma yin pa gang gis bzung ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24a-15: gtses par gyur pa'i mi ma yin pa de gud du 'gro bar gyur cig ces bsams te smras na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24a-17: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de skad du brjod pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24a-18: mi ma yin pa de gud du ma song na /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24b-3: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de skad ces brjod pas /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24b-12: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma spyad pa /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24b-14: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24b-15: yang dag par spong ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24b-19: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24b-20: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24b-24: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:24b-26: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25a-3: smon pa med pa la ma spyad pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma chud pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs la bdud sdig to can nye bar 'ongs te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25a-6: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs byed cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25a-7: bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i bden pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25a-8: bden pa'i tshig des mi ma yin pa de gud du 'gro bar gyur cig ces brjod pa las /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25a-9: bdud sdig to can de mi ma yin par gyur pa de ci nas kyang gud du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan du byed de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25a-10: de ci'i phyir zhe na; de ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can ni mi ma yin pa de bas ches mthu dang ldan zhing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25a-11: ches gzi brjid dang ldan pas de'i phyir bdud sdig can de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25a-12: mi ma yin pa de gud du song bar gyur pa la /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di snyam ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25a-14: de ltar bdag gi mthus mi ma yin pa de gud du song ngo snyam nas bdud kyi mthus mi ma yin pa de gud du song bar ni ma shes te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25a-15: de de'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la brnyas pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25b-0: 'thing slad byed cing smod la khyad du @25b gsod cing bdag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin gyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25b-1: 'di dag gzhan ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to zhes nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25b-2: de de tsam gyis nga rgyal 'phel bar byed pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25b-3: nga rgyal bskyed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25b-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ring du byed na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25b-5: de ltar thabs mi mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni de tsam gyis lhag pa'i nga rgyal bskyed pas des sa gnyis por 'gro bar rig par bya ste /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25b-14: thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25b-16: de lta bu'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o ////
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:25b-18: bam po lnga bcu bzhi pa /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:26a-3: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la ma spyad pa /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:26a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad du /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:26a-9: khyod kyi ming ni 'di zhes bya'o //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:26b-23: de de la 'di skad du khyod ni sngon yang 'thab pa nyung bar gyur to zhes zer te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:26b-25: de ni 'di ltar khyod la rnam pa de lta bu'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag yod pa las na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:26b-26: gdon mi za bar sngon yang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27a-1: dag dang ldan par ma gyur mi srid do zhes zer ba la /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27a-2: de de ltar sngon gyi ming dang rus bstan pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27a-3: da ltar byung ba'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27a-7: yang na dge slong gi cha byad du nye bar 'ong /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27a-8: yang na dge slong ma'i cha byad du nye bar 'ong /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27a-9: yang na khyim bdag gi cha byad du nye bar 'ong /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27a-10: yang na ma'i cha byad du nye bar 'ong /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27a-11: yang na pha'i cha byad du nye bar 'ong zhing; 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27b-10: smod pa byed cing khyad du gsod la smod na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27b-12: 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming gi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27b-14: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming gi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27b-17: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma spyad pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27b-18: phung po'i bdud mi shes te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27b-19: gzugs mi shes; tshor ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27b-22: rnam par shes pa mi shes pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27b-23: de la bdud sdig to can ming gi byin gyi rlabs kyis lung ston cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:27b-24: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ming 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming gang bsams pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:28a-2: de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'chal pa'i ngang tshul can thabs la mi mkhas pa de 'di snyam ste /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:28a-4: rjes su dpyad pa de nyid bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i ming du 'gyur ro zhes snyam ste; ji lta ji ltar bdud sdig to can nam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:28a-6: bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dge slong dag ston pa de lta de ltar sems shing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:28a-7: ji ltar bdag gis sems bskyed pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:28a-8: bdag gi ming ji lta ba bzhin du dge slong 'dis bstan te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:28a-11: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to snyam nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:28a-13: byang chub sems dpa' de la gang ngas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:34a-0: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs @34a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:34a-1: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi'ang yab dang yum du 'gyur ro //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:34a-4: da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi'ang yab dang yum du gyur to //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:34a-11: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:34a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar 'dod pa dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:34a-14: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams yongs su bsdu bar bya'o //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:35a-17: stong pa nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:39a-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snang ba'o; ;rigs kyi bu /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50a-5: gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50a-6: bdud sdig to can mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50a-8: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50a-9: bdud sdig to can ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50a-10: sems gcig tsam 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50a-12: spu g-yo bar 'gyur bar skar ma ltung ba gtong zhing 'jigs pa skyed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50a-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50a-14: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te bcom ldan 'das /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas ma chi bar 'gyur ram /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas 'ong ba ma yin no //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-0: dga' bos gsol pa bcom @50b ldan 'das /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-1: 'o na ji lta bu'i drung du mchi bar 'gyur /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-5: sems mos par ma byas pa de'i drung du bdud sdig to can dag gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-7: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-8: 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-9: 'on te ma yin zhes the tshom du gyur pa de dag gi drung du bdud sdig to can gtse ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'ong ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-11: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-12: des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong bas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi thos so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-14: ma thos pas mi shes so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bsgom pa ma shes pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-16: de bzhin nyid du nan tan mi byed de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-18: byang chub sems dpa' de yang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-20: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral la /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-21: dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin par byed na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:50b-23: byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-1: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos ma yin pa la bsngags pa brjod na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-2: de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-3: gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba ni bdag gi grogs yin te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-4: gang dam pa'i chos ma yin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba de ni /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa mang po'i nang nas bdag gi grogs su rnyed pa ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-6: de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'di lta ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa gnyis las gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ni /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-9: de bdag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o snyam ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-11: byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro; ;dga' bo /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-12: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu la bdud kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur zhe na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-13: byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-14: 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-15: khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pas ci zhig bya /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-19: kun chub par byas pas kyang ci zhig bya /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51a-20: ngas kyang de'i gting ma rnyed na khyod kyis lta rnyed re skan zhes zer na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-0: byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags @51b rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-2: gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' brnyas pa bskyed cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-3: nga ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-9: khyod ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no zhes rlom sems su byed na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-16: byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-18: gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid mchog tu rlom sems bskyed na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-19: dga' bo; de'i tshe bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-23: tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-25: byang chub sems dpa' de la'ang bdud sdig to can gyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-27: gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ming brjod pa'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-28: rus brjod pa kun tu grags par gyur na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:51b-31: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dge ba'i chos can dag khyad du gsod cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-0: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub @52a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-3: mtshan mar bya ba'i yon tan de dag kyang de la med par /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-6: mtshan ma med pa de dag gis nyon mongs pa bskyed cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-9: 'di skad du ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par snang ba de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas par mi snang ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas par mi snang ngo zhes /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-12: de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag la mi snyan par brjod cing smod na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-13: de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-14: bdag gi gnas ni stongs par mi 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-15: sems can dmyal ba chen po dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-16: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-18: yi dvags kyi yul shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-19: ci nas kyang de'i tshig gzung du rung bar 'gyur ba da lta de ltar bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' de byin gyis rlob ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-20: de'i tshig gzung du rung bas skye bo mang po dag kyang mnyan pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-21: yid ched bar bya bar sems te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-22: de la de dag gis thos sam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-23: mthong na mthun par spyod par 'gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-25: mthong nas mthun par spyod cing de bzhin du slob ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52a-26: de dag de bzhin du slob cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-0: de bzhin @52b nyid du nan tan byed pa'i tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-1: nyon mongs pa shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-2: de ltar de dag bsam pa phyin ci log tu gyur pas lus dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-4: yid kyi las gang dang gang brtsams pa de dag thams cad mi 'dod pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-6: yid du mi 'ong bar 'grub par 'gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-7: de ltar na sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag kyang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-8: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-10: yi dvags kyi yul yang rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-11: bdud kyi gnas kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur bas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-13: don gyi dbang de mthong nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-14: bdud sdig to can dga' ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-17: yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-19: gzhan yang gal te gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa; gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang rtsod cing nga ni mchog tu gyur pa yin gyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-20: khyod ni ma yin no zhes zer na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-21: de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-22: kye ma rigs kyi bu 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ring du byed pa ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-23: 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa ma yin no //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-27: rtsod pa dang; mtshang 'dru ba 'di dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-28: de ni sems can dmyal ba'i lam mo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:52b-29: de ni byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam mo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-2: de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam ma yin no snyam du sems par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-4: gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-5: gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan du 'thab cing rtsod la /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-7: de la bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-8: 'di gnyis ka'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-9: 'di gnyis ka'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-11: rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis gang brtsams pa de ni /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-12: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ma yin /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-13: rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis kyis ni /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-15: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-16: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam brtsams so zhes nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-18: tshim zhing yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-20: gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-21: byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa la gnod par sems shing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-24: gal te des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtang zhe na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53a-25: ji tsam du sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa skyes pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-0: 'khrug cing mtshang 'dru bar gyur pa de srid kyi @53b bskal par go cha bgo bar bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-3: de dag gi sems bskyed pa de dag la 'byung ba gzhan mchis sam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-5: bskal pa de snyed kho na ra go cha bgo 'tshal /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-8: gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-9: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la ngas 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-12: de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang 'tha' cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-14: rtsod la gshe zhing mi snyan du brjod pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-15: 'thabs shing rtsod de gshe ba dang mi snyan par brjod pa byas na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-16: phyir mi 'chags par mdud par 'dzin cing khon du bzung ste gnas na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-18: gang zag de ni 'byung bar mi smra ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-19: gang zag des gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtang zhe na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-20: gdon mi za bar bskal pa de snyed du go cha bgo bar bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'thabs shing rtsod de gshe ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-23: mi snyan par brjod par gyur na'ang mdud par mi 'dzin la /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-25: bdag gis ni thob par bya ba nyes par thob ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:53b-26: bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal bsal dgos na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-0: de ltar bdag smra ba la phyir smra ba @54a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-1: dang; bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi zam par gyur par bya dgos na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-2: de ltar na bdag gzhan la mi snyan par smra zhing phyir zlog pa ni mi tshul gyi; bdag gis de ltar mi bya'o /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-3: bdag gis ni glen pa dang lkug pa bzhin du bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-4: bdag gis bsam pa la 'khrug pa med par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-5: sems can 'di dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-6: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya dgos na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-7: de dag nyid la bdag ngan sems su byed pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-8: de dag nyid la bdag 'khrug pa ni tshul ma yin gyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-9: bdag gis de dag la gnod sems su mi bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-10: bdag gis de dag la 'khrug par mi bya'o snyam na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'byung ba yod par ngas bshad de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-13: de la ni bdud sdig to can glags lta zhing glags tshol bas kyang glags mi rnyed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-14: dga' bo; gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang 'grogs par mi bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-15: de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas par mi bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-17: gal te 'dug na'ang des su la'ang gnod sems su mi bya /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54a-20: gang bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems su bya ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-0: 'khrug @54b par bya ba de dag ni bdag la mi tshul lo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-2: 'di ltar de dag ni bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-3: sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba dag go snyam du bya'o ////
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-5: bam po lnga bcu lnga pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-8: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dag dang gnas par bgyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-13: ston pa dang ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang gnas par bya ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-15: 'di ni bdag gi grogs te gru gcig tu zhugs pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-16: 'dis ni ji ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-17: 'dis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-18: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:54b-19: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:60b-23: de ltar chos thams cad yongs su dag pa la /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:64b-19: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar gyur pa yin te /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:65a-0: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba yin @65a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:65a-2: de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de ma yin pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas nyan thos dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:66a-23: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang spyod bzhin du /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:70a-6: sgyu ma lta bu'i sems las gud na chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:73a-1: don zab mo la spyod cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:73a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gyur ba'i don de mngon du mi byed pa ni dka' ba byed pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:73a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na dka' ba cung zad kyang mi bgyid na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba bgyid pa lags so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:73a-7: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:73a-9: de ni 'di ltar gang mngon du bgyi ba'i don de'ang mi dmigs /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:73a-10: gang gis mngon du bgyi ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:73a-11: gang mngon du bgyi ba'i chos de'ang mi dmigs te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:73a-13: chos thams cad gang mngon du bgyis pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu'ang gang zhig mchis /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:73a-18: de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mun pa ma mchis pa 'thob pa'o //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:73a-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:73b-2: de ni spyod do zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:74a-24: snod chus gang ba'i nang du byung ba de ni bdag las ring ngo zhes bgyi bar mi sems so //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:74b-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni sdug pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:74b-8: mi sdug pa ma mchis so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:74b-9: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:89b-1: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:89b-2: de nas 'khor de'i nang nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams me tog manda ra ba mang po thogs te /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:410a-17: bdag gi don du ni 'khor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin no zhes te /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:497b-11: stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa la gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong bar nga smra'o //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498a-2: stong pa nyid de dag sgom pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498a-3: dngos po gnyis su med pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498a-4: rab tu spros pa med pa 'di ni /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498a-6: thams cad kyi mtshan nyid thams cad du blta'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498a-7: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498a-12: shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa lags /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498a-20: khams sna tshogs khams du ma pa'i 'jig rten pa de dag la sems can gyi rigs dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498a-21: rang bzhin rab tu mang po yod de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498a-24: rigs dang po nas bzang po'i khyad par 'dod cing bzang po'i khyad par nyid thob pa de lta bu'ang yod do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498a-26: rigs gang dang po nas khyad par ngan pa 'dod cing ngan pa nyid 'thob ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498a-27: de nyid kyis mgu bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'ang yod do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498a-28: rus dang rigs gang thog ma nas ngan pa'i bye brag 'dod cing ngan pa nyid 'thob ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-0: ngan pa thob nas de tsam gyis mgu @498b bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-1: de nas phyis gong du bzang po'i khyad par 'dod cing bzang po 'thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu dag kyang yod do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-2: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-5: gang sems can gyi rus dang rigs gsum pa de dgra bcom pa thob nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-6: bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par 'tshal na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i skye ba'ang ma mchis par lung bstan te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-8: skye ba ma mchis na ji ltar 'thob par 'gyur /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-11: de'i skye ba las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pa yin par ming mi 'dogs kyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-12: de'i skye ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba gdags so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-13: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-14: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa rgya che ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-16: lhag pa'i bsam pa mthu che ba gang la dang po nyid du bzang po'i khyad par 'tshal zhing bzang po'i khyad par nyid 'thob par 'gyur ba de ngo mtshar che'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:498b-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa rgya che ba de dag gang lags /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499a-1: chub sems dpa' rnams de la ma chags pa'i bde ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499a-3: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong bar 'dod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ltar 'khor ba yongs su mi gtong pa'i phyir te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499a-4: 'di ni de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mthu chen po yin par blta'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499a-5: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499a-6: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499a-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499a-10: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos thob par 'tshal bas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499a-11: bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la rab tu phye ba'i le'u ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499a-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499a-15: bam po bdun cu bdun pa /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499b-12: rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshol ba na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499b-14: srog la mi lta ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499b-15: rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499b-16: grags pa la mi gnas pas btsal to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499b-17: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshol ba na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499b-18: dgon pa na 'dug pa'i tshe bar snang las 'di skad du /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499b-20: shar phyogs su song zhig dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499b-21: de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499b-22: ci nas kyang lus ngal ba'i yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:499b-24: gnyid kyi yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-1: yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-2: skom gyi yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-3: mtshan mo'i yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-4: nyin par gyi yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-5: grang ba'i yid la byed pa mi skye ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-6: tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skye ba de ltar song zhig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-7: phyi rol dang nang gang la'ang sems ma 'jog cig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-9: g-yon du lta zhing ma 'gro cig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-15: mtshams rnams su lta zhing ma 'gro zhig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-17: ci nas kyang 'jig tshogs la mi g-yo ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-18: gzugs la mi g-yo ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-22: rnam par shes pa la mi g-yo ba de ltar song zhig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-23: gang de la g-yos pa de ni 'gal bar gnas so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-24: gang las 'gal bar gnas she na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-25: sangs rgyas kyi chos las 'gal bar gnas so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-26: gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las 'gal bar gnas pa de 'khor ba na spyod do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-27: gang 'khor ba na spyod pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rnyed do zhes zer ba'i sgra thos par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-28: sgra des de skad ces smras pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-29: rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra de'i lan 'di skad ces smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500a-32: bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi snang ba byed par 'dod cing /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-1: sgra des rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-2: rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i rigs kyi bu /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-4: de nas yang rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-6: smon pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la khyod kyis mos pa bskyed de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal bar bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-10: sems can du lta ba khyod kyis spang bar bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-11: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po rnams spang bar bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-15: mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-19: ma 'gags pa'i chos 'chad pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag bsnyen par bya /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-22: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar byas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du gyur pa'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-23: chos smra ba'i dge slong las ring po mi thogs par thos par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-24: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan pa de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:500b-25: khyod kyis drin du gzo ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-2: 'di las bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-3: gang thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las myur du slar mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-6: mi khoms pa rnams spangs par 'gyur ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-8: zhes rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phan yon 'di dag yongs su brtag cing chos smra ba'i dge slong la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'i /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-9: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyis chos smra ba'i dge slong la bsnyen par mi bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-10: khyod kyis chos don du gnyer ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-11: chos la gus pas chos smra ba'i dge slong gi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-12: khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams kyang shes par bya ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-14: bdud sdig to can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-18: reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-20: spyad pa'i phyir khyer te 'ong ba dag kyang yod do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501a-21: de dag kyang zil gyis mnan nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-0: thabs mkhas pas so sor bsnyen bsten yongs @501b su spyod do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-1: de la'ang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos smra ba la sems ma dad pa mi bskyed pa 'di ltar sems bskyed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-2: bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de rab tu mi shes kyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-3: 'di ni thabs mkhas pas rab tu shes so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-4: 'di ni sems can gyi tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di rnams so sor bsnyen bsten spyod par byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la'ang chags pa'am sgrib pa med do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-6: de'i tshe'ang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-8: chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul yang gang zhe na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-9: 'di ltar chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-10: rnam par byang ba med pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-12: chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-13: chos thams cad ni sems can med pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-20: rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor rtog cing chos smra ba'i rjes su 'brang na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-21: ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:501b-22: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdud kyi las gzhan dag kyang shes par bya ba ni /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-0: gal te chos smra ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @502a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-1: 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu la gshe zhing mi lta na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-2: de la'ang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis slar bkyal bar mi bya'i /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-3: gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-5: sems mi skyo bas chos smra ba'i dge slong gi rjes su 'brang bar bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-6: de nas rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra de las gdams pa 'di lta bu thos nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-7: shar phyogs kyi phyogs ga la ba der song ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-8: song nas ring po ma lon par yang de la 'di snyam du gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-9: bdag gis sgra de las bdag ji srid du 'gro dgos zhes ma dris so snyam nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-10: de sa phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-13: smre sngags 'don cing 'di snyam du sems so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-14: sa phyogs 'di nyid du nyin zhag gcig gam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-20: nyin zhag bdun 'das par byas te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos kyi bar du lus ngal ba'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-22: rgyugs pa dang gnyid kyi yid la byed pa mi bskyed /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-23: bza' ba'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-24: btung pa'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-25: mtshan mo'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502a-26: nyin par gyi yid la byed pa mi bskyed /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-0: grang ba'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed do snyam du sems @502b so; ;rab 'byor /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-3: mi zhig bu gcig pa zhig dus las 'das te sdug bsngal dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-4: yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-5: de bu'i mya ngan gyis bu'i mya ngan las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa mi 'byung ba de bzhin du /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-7: rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang de'i tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-8: nam zhig bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de thos par 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa mi 'byung ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-10: de nas rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar phongs shing 'dug pa'i mdun du /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-12: rigs kyi bu khyod de skad smra ba legs so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-15: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-16: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar da ltar khyed 'tshol ba de bzhin du btsal to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-18: de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus de nyid dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-20: don du gnyer ba de nyid dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-21: mos pa de nyid kyis rgyun chags par shar phyogs su song zhig dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:502b-22: 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyan spos can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer zhig yod de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-0: rin po che sna bdun las byas @503a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-1: pa; rab bdun rim gyis bskor ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-3: shing ta la'i phreng ba bdun gyis bskor ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-5: zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-10: srang gi tshong khang ri mo la bris pa lta bu mnyam pa lnga brgya yod pa; khyogs dang bzhon pa mi dog par 'gro ba'i zam pa dang bcas pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-11: grong khyer de'i kho ra khor yug gi rtsig pa'ang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-12: rin po che sna bdun gyi rtsig pa de dag gi rib ma'ang dzambu na da'i gser las byas pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-13: tshad dang ldan zhing 'phang mtho ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-14: rib ma de dag re re las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-15: 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa rnams skyes te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-16: 'bras bu de dag thams cad las kyang rin po che las byas pa'i srad bus sbrel ba'i shing gzhan dag dang ldan pa sha stag go /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-17: grong khyer de thams cad kyang gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas g-yogs te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-18: gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba de dag rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba chags par 'gyur ba dag 'byung ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-20: yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rnga rol mo mkhan mkhas pa rnams /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-21: tshogs pas brdungs pa'i sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong la /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503a-22: chags par 'gyur ba'i sgra 'byung ba de bzhin du /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-0: dril bu'i dra ba de @503b dag rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba chags par 'gyur ba 'byung ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-1: sems can de dag kyang sgra de dag gis rtse zhing dga' ba dang yongs su spyod par byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-2: grong khyer spos can de'i kho ra khor yug gi 'obs kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang zhing rgyun du 'bab ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-4: ha cang yang mi dro ba'i chu de la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gru sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-5: de dag tu sems can de dag zhugs nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-7: yongs su spyod pa byed do; ;chu de dag thams cad kyang autpa la dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-11: gzhan yang me tog rigs che zhing bsung zhim pa dag gis yongs su khebs te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-12: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-13: me tog gi rigs gang dang gang yod pa de dag thams cad spos can gyi grong khyer na med pa gcig kyang med do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-14: grong khyer de'i kho ra khor yug na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-15: de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-16: bzang zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag go /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-17: skyed mos tshal de re re na'ang rgyang grags gcig pa'i mtsho lnga brgya yod de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-18: mtsho de dag thams cad na'ang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:503b-19: rin po che sna bdun gyi autpa la dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-0: punda ri ka mdzes shing blta na sdug pa rnams @504a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-5: punda ri ka de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam sha stag ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-6: mthing ga la kha dog mthing gar 'dug pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-7: mthing ga 'dra zhing mthing gar snang ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-8: ser po la kha dog ser po /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-9: ser po 'dra zhing ser por snang ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-10: dmar po la kha dog dmar po; dmar po 'dra zhing dmar por snang ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-11: dkar po la kha dog dkar ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-12: dkar po 'dra zhing dkar por snang ba sha stag go /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-13: mtsho de dag thams cad na bya ngang mo dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-17: ngur pa'i sgras khyab par sgrogs so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-18: skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi ba med /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-19: yongs su gzung ba med pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-20: sems can de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-21: 'di ltar yun ring por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-22: chos zab mo la rab tu mos pa'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba sha stag go /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-24: spos can gyi grong khyer gyi lam srang gi mdo'i dbus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i khyim kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-25: rin po che bdun las byas pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504a-26: rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-1: shing ta la'i phreng ba bdun gyis bskor ba'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-2: khyim de na khyim gyi longs spyod du skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-3: rtag par rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-4: mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-5: mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-6: me tog mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal lo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-7: skyed mos tshal de dag re re na'ang mtshe'u brgyad brgyad yod de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-8: bzang mo zhes bya ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-9: bzang mo'i mchog ces bya ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-10: dga' ba zhes bya ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-11: dga' ba'i mchog ces bya ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-12: bde ba zhes bya ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-13: bde ba can zhes bya ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-14: nges pa zhes bya ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-15: rnam par mi 'bab pa zhes bya ba ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-16: mtshe'u de rnams kyi ngos gcig ni gser las byas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-17: ngos gnyis pa ni dngul las byas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-18: ngos gsum pa ni bee d'urya las byas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-19: ngos bzhi pa ni shel las byas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-20: nang gi gzhi ni kar ke da na las byas shing gzhi gser gyi bye ma bkram pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-21: mtshe'u de re re la'ang 'bab stegs khri 'phang can brgyad brgyad yod de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-22: 'bab stegs kyi ngos kun rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-23: 'bab stegs kyi bar thams cad nas dzambu na da'i gser gyi chu shing dag skyes so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-24: mtshe'u de dag thams cad na me tog autpa la dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:504b-27: punda ri ka sna tshogs kyis khebs shing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505a-0: @505a *// mtshe'u de dag gi kho ra khor yug na me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skye'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505a-1: me tog gi shing de dag rlung gis btab pa'i me tog rnams kyang mtshe'u'i nang du lhags so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505a-2: mtshe'u de dag thams cad kyi chu'ang tsandan gyi bsung can la kha dog dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505a-5: reg pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505a-6: de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rtse ba'i sa yod de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505a-8: bud med stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505a-9: de na rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505a-10: grong khyer de na gnas pa'i sems can skyes pa'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505a-11: bud med gang yin pa de dag kyang rtag par rab tu dga' zhing skyed mos tshal dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505a-12: mtshe'u rnams su 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan zhing 'byor pas rtse dga' yongs su spyod do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'ang 'khor dang bcas par tha gi tsam zhig rtse zhing dga' ba yongs su spyad nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505a-14: de'i 'og tu dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-0: grong khyer spos can de na 'khod pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi lam mdo'i dbus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i chos kyi khri 'dzugs @505b te; rkang pa gser las byas pa'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-7: ka shi ka'i gos bting ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-8: 'phang du rgyang grags phyed tsam yod pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-9: steng gi bar snang las kyang mu tig gis brgyan pa'i bla re bres pa sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu 'ang me tog kha dog rnam pa lngas 'thor /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-12: bdug spos bsung zhim po sna tshogs kyis kyang sa phyogs de bdug par byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-13: de 'di ltar chos la gus pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang la 'dug nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'chad pa la /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-15: bsung can na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la de lta bu'i chos la gus pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa ni srog chags brgya phrag mang po /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-16: srog chags stong phrag mang po /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-17: srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po rnams lhags par gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-18: mi dang lha rnams gang nyan pa de dag las kha cig ni klog slob /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-19: kha cig ni kha ton slob /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:505b-20: kha cig ni yongs su chud par byed /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-1: yid la byed pa'i rjes su 'gro'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-2: sems can de dag thams cad kyang ltung ba'i chos can ma yin la /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-4: rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'i drung du song zhig dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-5: de las khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-6: de ni rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yun ring po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskul ma 'debs pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-8: gzengs bstod pa rab tu spro bar byed pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-9: rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa da ltar khyod 'tshol ba bzhin du btsal to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-10: rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du ngal bso ba'i yid la byed pa ma bskyed par song zhig dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-11: ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' 'di thos nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-13: dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga'/
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-14: mos shing yid bde bar gyur pa ni /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-17: mi zhig dug dang bcas pa'i zug rngus zug na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506a-18: nam zhig bdag gis zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa gang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-0: @506b gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar byed pa nam rnyed par 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba'ang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-1: gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing chos gang bdag gis thos nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-2: dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de nam mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa las gzhan pa'i chos cung zad kyang yid la mi byed do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas phyogs de nyid du 'dug ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-4: chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-5: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-6: tshe rabs snga ma la goms pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa ni /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-8: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-9: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs par zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-10: chos thams cad la ye shes 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-11: chos thams cad la tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-12: chos thams cad mi 'gyur bar mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:506b-13: chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507a-2: chos thams cad mi shes pa 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507a-7: me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar rab tu snang ba mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507a-12: ma mnan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507a-13: rang bzhin gyi tha snyad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507a-14: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507a-17: chos thams cad rnam par mi mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-0: chos thams cad nges pa'i sgra dang @507b tshig dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-1: chos thams cad mi sgrib pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-2: nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-3: rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-4: gzugs kyi rgyal po nye bar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-5: rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
