K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-7: chos kyi dbyings las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-8: dbugs 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-9: sengge'i sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-10: chos can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-11: rdul dang rnam par bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-12: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-13: padmo'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-14: the tshom gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-15: snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-16: chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-19: mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-20: chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-21: chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:507b-22: le lo thams cad spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-1: ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-2: ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-3: mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-4: bdud kyi 'khor 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-5: khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-6: 'od zer 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-8: de ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas par gyur nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rab tu ston pa rnams mthong ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-12: de la legs pa sbyin zhing dbugs phyung nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-14: nged kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btsal te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-16: ting nge 'dzin 'di dag rab tu thob pa ni gang de ltar khyod kyis thob pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-17: ting nge 'dzin de dag rab tu thob nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-18: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos la rab tu gnas par gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508a-19: nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi rang bzhin dang ngo bo nyid la bltas na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-2: gang byang chub tu spyod pa'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-3: gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang ma mthong ngo; ;rigs kyi bu /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang la'ang sems pa med do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-6: nged kyis sems pa med pa la gnas pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-7: lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'di lta bu dag rab tu thob /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-8: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-9: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-12: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-13: sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-14: bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-15: yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang tshad gzung ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-16: mtha' bstan par mi nus na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-18: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lta smos kyang mi dgos pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag rab tu thob bo /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-19: de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyang chos 'di dag nyid la gus pa rab tu bskyed par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-20: lhag par don du gnyer ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:508b-21: mos par bya ba bskyed par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-0: mos par byed pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi dkon @509a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-1: no; ;rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang gus pa rab tu bskyed cing dga' bar bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-3: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-5: bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-8: khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas yun ring po nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-10: thabs mkhas pa la'ang bslabs te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-11: de ni rigs kyi bu khyod la phan 'dogs pa yin /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-12: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-13: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i byas pa gzungs su bzung ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509a-14: gal te rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-3: de bas kyang lhag par ras kyi thod bzhin du mgo la khyer ram /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-4: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad byin nam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-5: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-10: reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byin yang de tsam gyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan lon par mi 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-12: rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams thob par gyur /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mkhas pa thos par gyur /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-16: byang chub sems dpa' rtag par rab tu ngu bas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po thob pa'i le'u ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-18: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-20: de'ang ting nge 'dzin de rnams las langs par gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-21: langs nas kyang de 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gnas byon /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam sems par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:509b-23: des de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-1: zhing gdung ba chen por gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-2: 'di snyam du sems par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-3: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de gzungs rab tu thob la /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-4: lnga mngon par shes pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-6: bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te yun ring por des bdag gi don byas pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gar bzhud ces bya ba'i don de bdag gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'i drung du nye bar song ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-9: dri bar bya'o snyam du sems par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de la dga' ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-14: gus pa bskyed nas sngar 'di snyam du bsams so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-15: bdag gis bsti stang ji lta bu zhig gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la bsnyen par bya /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510a-16: bdag kyang dbul bas bdag la gos sam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-2: gdugs gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de la bsti stang du bya bar 'os pa de lta bu cung zad kyang med /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-3: bdag de bzhin du 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de'i drung du 'gro bar yang mi rigs la /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-4: bdag dga' zhing mgu bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba de lta bur bla ma la gus shing rim gror bya ba'i don yid la byed pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-8: grong khyer gcig cig tu phyin te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-9: der tshong 'dus kyi dbus su phyin pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-12: de'i rin gyis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-13: yun ring mo zhig tu bdag gi lus stong tsam zhig par gyur /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-17: dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bar yang dang yang du 'khor ba na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-18: dpag tu med pa'i sems can dmyal pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-20: gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal myong bar gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-21: de yang 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhi'i phyir gyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:510b-23: byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu dag la mchod pa'i phyir ni ma yin no snyam mo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-2: tshong 'dus kyi dbus su mi su nyo /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-3: mi su nyo zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste bos so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-4: de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba 'di chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa byas nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-7: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du rdzogs par 'gyur /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-8: thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu thob par 'gyur /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-9: bdud dang bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-10: yon tan thams cad kyi mthar phyin par 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pas yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-11: des kyang sems can mang po'i don byed par 'gyur de dag kyang bdag gi spyod yul las 'das par 'gyur la /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-12: sems can gzhan dag kyang bdag gi spyod yul las 'das nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-14: de'i phyir bdag gis de'i bar chang bya'o snyam du bsams so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:511a-15: de nas bdud sdig to can gyis bram ze dang /

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516a-30: brla'ang sha med par byas nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-0: rtsig pa zhig gi drung du rus pa gcog @516b tu song ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-2: rkang sbyin no snyam pa las /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-3: de khrag zag cing 'dug pa bdag gis khang thog nas mthong ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-4: de la bdag 'di snyam du mi 'di ci byed pa zhig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-5: 'di ltar bdag la bdag gnod par byed snyam nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-6: de'i drung du bdag mchis te 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-7: rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag la bdag khrag 'byin /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-8: de nas rigs kyi bu des bdag la 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-9: bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-14: bdag ni dbul bas nor gzhan cung zad kyang med do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-15: de la bdag gis 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-16: nor des khyod la ci zhig bya /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-17: des bdag la 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod cing chos 'dod pa'i phyir /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-19: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gror bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-20: de la bdag gis 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-21: rigs kyi bu khyod de las yon tan gyi rigs dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-22: yon tan gyi bye brag ci zhig 'byung /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-23: des bdag la 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-24: de ni bdag la sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-25: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston par 'gyur zhing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dpag tu med pa mi 'phrogs pa de lta bu'i chos rnams de las thos par 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-27: de bdag gis thos pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:516b-28: dga' zhing mgu ba chen po skyes shing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-1: bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos pa dang bdag 'di snyam du gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-2: gang 'di lta bu dag byed nus pa ni /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-3: rigs kyi bu 'di dka' ba spyod pa ste ngo mtshar che'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-4: rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-5: bdag gi lus yongs su gtong na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-6: bdag cag gis ci'i phyir chos 'di mchod par mi bya /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-7: 'di lta bu dag gi gnas su ci'i phyir smon lam mi gdab /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-8: bdag cag la longs spyod rgya chen po rab tu mang du yod do snyam nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-9: bdag gis rigs kyi bu 'di la 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-10: rigs kyi bu khyod bdag la gnod pa 'di lta bu ma byed cig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-11: bdag gis nor mang po pha ma las bslangs te sbyin no //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-12: des khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-13: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la rim gro byos shig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-14: bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-15: bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-16: bdag kyang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du gang khyod kyis bshad pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517a-19: nor mang po phal cher bdag la stsal te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-0: bdag @517b rigs kyi bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa bgyid du mchi bar ci gnang ////
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-1: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-2: bam po bdun cu brgyad pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-3: de nas bu mo de'i pha ma gnyis kyis bu mo de la 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-4: bu mo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu de'i gtam byas pa ni rab tu dka'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-5: 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa sems can thams cad bde bar byed pa'i chos gang gi phyir /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-6: rigs kyi bu de 'di lta bu'i dka' ba nyams su len pa'i chos de dag kyang shin tu bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-8: bu mo khyod nged kyis gnang ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-9: nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de blta ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-12: de nas bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-13: bkur stir byed du 'dong 'dod pa'i pha ma gnyis la 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-14: bdag ni su la'ang dge ba'i bar chad mi bgyid do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-15: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang de'i pha ma la sogs pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-17: bu mo lnga brgya po de'ang brgyan nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-18: me tog sna tshogs rnams thogs /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:517b-19: gos rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-10: dngul gyi me tog rnams thogs /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-11: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-21: btung ba mang po thogs nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang lhan cig tu shing rta gcig la zhon /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-23: bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang shing rta lnga brgya la zhon pas yongs su bskor /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-24: mdun du byas nas 'khor mang po dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi phyogs gang na ba de logs su dong ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-25: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba mthar gyis song song na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-26: rgyang ring po zhig nas spos can gyi grong khyer rin po che sna bdun las byas pa mdzes shing blta na sdug pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-27: rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ra ba bdun gyis bskor ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-28: rta babs bdun dang ldan pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-30: shing ta la'i phreng ba bdun gyis bskor ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-31: chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518a-32: zheng du'ang dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518b-0: tshong 'dus kyi srang ri mo @518b la bris pa lta bu lnga brgya dang ldan pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518b-1: bzhon pa lhan cig tu gshi bas [*gshibs?] te 'gro ba'i zam pa dang bcas pa de lta bu mthong ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518b-2: lam gyi mdo'i dbus na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa chos kyi stan gyi steng na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518b-3: 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas chos 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518b-4: des mthong ma thag tu 'di lta bu'i bde ba thob pa ni /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518b-6: bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag pa'i dge slong sems rtse gcig tu bzhag pa de lta bu'i bde ba thob par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518b-7: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du bdag shing rta la zhon bzhin du 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i drung du 'gro ba ni mi rigs so snyam du bsams nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518b-8: de shing rta las babs so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518b-9: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang shing rta de dag las babs so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518b-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du ba de tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518b-11: mdun du byas nas dpag tu med pa'i rgyan rnams thogs te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:518b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-0: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang pa brtsegs @519a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-1: ma rin po che sna bdun las byas pa zhig byas te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-3: mu tig gi dra ba bres pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-4: brtsegs khang gi gra bzhir me mar gyis snang ba bya ba'i phyir /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-5: nor bu rin po che 'od gsal ba rnams bkod do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-6: dngul gyi pog por bzhi'ang bar snang las 'phyang du bcug ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-7: de na aa ka ru nag po gtsang ma'i bdug pa rnams 'thul ba ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa'i phyir ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-8: brtsegs khang de'i nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri bzhag ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-9: de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag go /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-10: de'i nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi glegs bam la bee d'urya mthing ga zhun mas bris pa bzhugs so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-11: brtsegs khang de'ang me tog dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-12: dar sna tshogs kyi phreng ba rnams kyis dbyangs pas rab tu brgyan to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu dub de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-14: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang pa brtsegs ma de dpag tu med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-15: lha stong phrag du ma rnams kyang mthong /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-16: lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog manda ra ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-17: lha'i tsandan gyi phye ma dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-18: lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519a-19: lha'i dngul gyi phye mas khang pa brtsegs ma de dag la kun tu 'thor /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-0: rab tu mngon par @519b 'thor ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-1: lha'i sil snyan dag sgrog pa thos nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-3: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-4: lha'i dbang po khyod ci'i phyir lha stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs ma 'di la me tog manda ra ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-5: tsandan gyi phye ma la sogs pas 'thor /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-7: lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang bar snang las lha rnams ci'i phyir sgrogs /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-8: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-9: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-11: rigs kyi bu khyod mi shes sam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-12: 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces pa'i yum /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-15: bskrun pa gtso mo yin te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-18: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-19: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-20: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-21: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu du bas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-22: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:519b-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gces pa'i yum /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520a-1: bskrun pa gtso mo de gang na bzhugs /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520a-3: 'o na lha khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520a-4: gser gyi glegs bu la bee d'urya mthing ga zhun mas bris pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520a-6: rgya bdun gyis btab ste bzhag pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520a-7: de bdag cag gis khyed la bstan du mi rung ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520a-9: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu tshogs pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520a-23: dngul gyi me tog bdag cag gis khyer te 'ongs pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520a-24: de dag las kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhag go /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520a-25: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520b-0: sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis @520b shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa gang na ba der song ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520b-2: song nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la me tog dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520b-14: dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir kun tu gtor /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520b-16: rab tu mngon par gtor to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520b-17: de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i steng du me tog gi brtsegs khang du gnas par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520b-19: dngul gyi me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa de dag kyang nam mkha' la gzhal yas khang du gnas par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520b-21: gos rin po che de dag kyang bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin lta bur gnas par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520b-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520b-23: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mchod pa byas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:520b-24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521a-1: 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas 'di snyam du gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521a-3: de ltar mthu che ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521a-4: de ltar gzi brjid che ba ngo mtshar che'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521a-5: rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521a-6: de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dag rnam par sprul na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521a-7: nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521a-9: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la dga' ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521a-10: gus pa skyes nas de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521a-11: bdag cag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521a-12: bdag cag byang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang chos gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas thob pa'i chos de dag nyid thob par gyur cig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-0: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed pa de ltar bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sti byed par gyur @521b cig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa 'di ji ltar 'gro ba mang po la rab tu ston pa de ltar bdag cag kyang 'gro ba mang po la rab tu ston par gyur cig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-2: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de bzhin du /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-3: bdag cag kyang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-4: yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces de lta bu'i smon lam dag kyang btab bo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-6: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la'ang bkur sti byas nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-11: thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-12: phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa la 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-14: bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'tshol ba na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-15: dgon pa zhig nas sgra thos pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:521b-17: shar phyogs su song zhig dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-1: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-2: de nas bdag gis sgra de thos pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-3: shar phyogs gang na ba de logs su song song ba las /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-4: bdag 'di snyam du bdag gis sgra de la bdag ji srid cig tu 'gro dgos pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-5: su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos shing thob par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam du bsams so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-6: de ltar bdag yid mi dga' ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-7: mya ngan chen por gyur cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-8: sa phyogs de nyid na nyin zhag bdun lon te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-9: bdag ji srid cig tu 'gro dgos /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-10: su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan du yod ces sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa'i mya ngan las gzhan pa kha zas bza' ba'i sems kyang ma skyes so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-12: de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-13: des bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-15: 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-16: spos can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer zhig yod de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad cing 'dug pa de khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-19: de nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus bka' stsal pa bzhin du shar phyogs gang na bde logs su song song ba las /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522a-20: rgyang gis 'phags pas chos 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-0: mthong @522b ma thag tu'ang dper na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-1: bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag pa'i dge slong gi bde ba de lta bu thob par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-2: bdag dga' zhing bde ba des khyab par gyur nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-3: sa phyogs de nyid nas ma g-yos par khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad cing 'dug pa thos so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-4: de thos nas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya phrag du ma skyes par gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-5: bdag de na 'dug pa'i tshe yang phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag la dbugs 'byin pa mdzad cing /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-7: ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba yin pas legs so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-9: nged kyis kyang de dag la gnas nas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-10: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan nas mi snang bar gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-12: bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gar gshegs snyam mo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-15: de nas yang bdag 'di snyam du gyur te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-16: 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pa de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:522b-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa la bslabs pa yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag @523a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa de bdag la ston to snyam mo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-4: rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag 'dri'i /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-6: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ga las byon pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-7: gar bzhud pa ci nas kyang bdag cag gis shes par 'gyur ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bur bdag la ston cig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-10: rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i le'u ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-12: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyis 'phags pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu ngu ba la 'di skad smras so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gang nas kyang ma byon /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni mi g-yo ba'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-19: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-22: skye ba med pa ni 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-23: skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523a-25: yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-0: yang dag pa'i @523b mtha' gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-2: stong pa nyid la ni 'gro ba'am 'ong ba med de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-3: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-5: ji lta ba nyid la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-6: ji lta ba nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-8: 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-9: 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-11: 'gog pa la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-12: 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-14: nam mkha'i dbyings la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-15: nam mkha'i dbyings gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-17: chos 'di rnams las gzhan pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-19: chos 'di rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de dag ni de bzhin nyid gcig ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-22: de bzhin nyid la ni rnam pa gnyis su med do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-24: de bzhin nyid ni gcig ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-26: gsum ma yin te; rigs kyi bu /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:523b-27: 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni med pa'i phyir bgrang ba las 'das pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-0: mi zhig dpyid zla tha chung gi nyi ma'i gung la dpyid kyi nyi @524a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-1: ma tsha bas gdungs pa na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-2: smig rgyu g-yo ba mthong ba dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-3: de de dang de dag tu rgyug cing 'dir khrus bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-4: 'dir chu btung ngo snyam du sems na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-8: shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-13: rtag par rab tu ngu bas smras pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-15: smig rgyu ba la chu yod pa ma yin na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-16: de la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba lta ga la yod /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-18: dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs pa'i mi de ni smig rgyu ba chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pas byis pa'i rigs /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-19: shes rab rtul po'i rigs te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-20: de na chu'i ngo bo ni yod pa ma yin no //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-26: de bzhin du gang su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-28: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-29: bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rigs /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-30: shes rab rtul po'i rigs so zhes brjod par bya ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-32: mi zhig chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin pas gzugs kyi skur mi blta'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524a-36: chos nyid la ni 'gro pa'am 'ong ba med de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-1: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-4: sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-7: rkang thang gi tshogs la 'ong ba'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-10: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'ang byon pa'am bzhud pa med do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-13: mi zhig gi rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-26: de bas kyang mang ba mthong nas sad pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-32: rtag par rab tu ngu bas smras pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-34: rmi lam gyi chos ni gang yang yongs su grub pa med de /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-35: rmi lam ni brdzun pa ste yang dag pa ma yin pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-38: de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:524b-39: rigs kyi bu gang su'ang rung /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-0: chos thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa legs par mi shes pa de dag ni de @525a *//
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-1: bzhin gshegs pa la ming gi tshogs sam /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-2: gzugs kyi tshogs su mngon par zhen pas /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-3: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-5: 'di ltar chos nyid rab tu mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-7: gang de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa'am /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-8: bzhud par 'dod pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa so so'i skye bo ste; de dag thams cad ni 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar dong /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-11: de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thag ring /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-12: de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang thag ring ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-14: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes bshad pa legs par shes pa de dag ni; chos gang yang 'ong ba'am 'gro bar mi rtog go /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-15: gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid 'di lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-16: de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-17: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob ma ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-18: grong khyer gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-19: de dag 'jig rten pa'i sbyin gnas so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525a-23: rgya mtsho chen po'i rin po che rnams ni shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-4: phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-5: 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus rgya mtsho chen por rin po che rnams 'byung ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-6: de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin gyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-7: rgyu dang rkyen rnams la rag lus pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-9: rin po che de dag med par 'gyur ba na'ang phyogs bcu gang du'ang mi 'pho ste dong pa med mod kyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-10: 'on kyang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-11: rin po che de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i rkyen rnams med par gyur pa las rin po che de rnams med par 'gyur ro; ;rigs kyi bu /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-12: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang ma byon /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de dag rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin gyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-15: sngon gyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa la rag lus pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-16: rgyu las kun tu byung ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-17: sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i sems can gyi dmigs pa dang ldan pa las snang ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-18: phyogs bcu gang na'ang yod pa ni ma yin gyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-19: rgyu dang rkyen gang rnams yod pa las sku yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang rkyen de rnams med pa dang yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:525b-23: pi wang gi sgra 'byung ba'i tshe /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-3: rten cing yang 'byung pa rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus so //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-6: pi wang gi khog pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-12: mi'i rtsol pa la brten nas pi wang gi sgra 'byung ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-13: sgra de'ang khog pa las kyang ma byung /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-17: sbreng shing las kyang ma byung /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-19: mi'i rtsol ba las kyang ma byung mod kyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-20: 'on kyang thams cad 'dus shing ldan pa las sgra 'byung ngo //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-21: 'gag pa na'ang sgra de gang du'ang mi 'gro /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-23: de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa'ang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-24: rgyu dang rkyen la rag lus pa ste /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-25: dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma las yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-28: dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig las sangs rgyas kyi sku byung ba ma yin no //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-29: rgyu med pa las byung ba'ang ma yin te /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-30: rgyu dang rkyen du ma tshogs pa las byung ba de gang nas kyang ma byon /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-31: rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med na'ang gang du'ang mi bzhud do //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526a-32: rigs kyi bu; de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byon pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526b-0: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang de bzhin du rig @526b par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526b-1: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526b-2: chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526b-3: 'gag pa med par rab tu shes na /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:526b-4: khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro //

K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:536b-8: khyod la lan gnyis lan gsum du gtad cing rjes su gtad kyi /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:536b-9: khyod kyis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di med par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:536b-11: ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na gnas pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bzhugs par rig par bya; de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'chad par rig par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:536b-13: sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:536b-17: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:536b-24: bsti stang du byed pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:536b-38: kho ra khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pas mchod par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-0: @537a *// chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar rig par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-2: sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring bar 'khod par rig par bya'o //
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-3: bcom ldan 'das thugs dgyes pas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-4: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-5: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-6: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal chen po'i bu dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-7: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-8: tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-9: tshe dang ldan pa ka ta ya na chen po dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-10: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-11: tshe dang ldan pa re ba ta dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-12: tshe dang ldan pa r'a hu la dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-16: lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' bar gyur to; ;shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-17: yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa drug pa'o ////
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-19: phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'das pa dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-21: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang /
K03acip-k_lha_sa-028-001:537a-24: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum rdzogs so ////
